notes: Template already uses semantic CSI styles (CSILevel0-5) that map directly to CSI hierarchy.
No new styles needed - existing styles preserve render-perfect formatting.
CSILevel0 serves dual purpose: section header (para 0) and END OF SECTION marker (para 29).
SectionID not separated as its own role - section number and name are combined in paragraph 0.
Paragraphs 12, 16, 17, 22, 26, 27, 28 are empty/placeholder paragraphs - no changes applied.
CSILevel4N (para 17) appears to be an alternate subparagraph style variant, not mapped to avoid confusion.
